sourcesContent:
<template>
  <e-charts :option="option"></e-charts>
</template>

<script>
// import {graphic} from 'echarts'

import {mapGetters} from "vuex";

export default {
  name: "DeveloperCommitChart",
  computed:{
    ...mapGetters(["getDeveloperChartY", "getDeveloperChartX"]),
    option(){
      return{
        tooltip: {
          trigger: 'axis',
          axisPointer: {
            type: 'shadow'
          }
        },
        legend: {},
        grid: {
          left: '3%',
          right: '4%',
          bottom: '3%',
          containLabel: true
        },
        xAxis: {
          type: 'value',
          boundaryGap: [0, 0.01]
        },
        yAxis: {
          
          name: 'developers',
          type: 'category',
          data: this.getDeveloperChartY
        },
        toolbox: {
          show: true,
          feature: {
            saveAsImage: {}
          }
        },
        series: [
          {
            name: 'commit times',
            type: 'bar',
            itemStyle: {
              // color: new graphic.LinearGradient(0, 0, 0, 1, [
              //   { offset: 0, color: '#83bff6' },
              //   { offset: 1, color: '#003366' }
              // ])
              color: '#4f64b6'
            },
            data: this.getDeveloperChartX
          },
          // {
          //   name: '2012',
          //   type: 'bar',
          //   data: [19325, 23438, 31000, 121594, 134141, 681807]
          // }
        ]
      }
    }
  },

  //       },
  //       toolbox: {

}
</script>
